Hello, my name is Ying Hu (she/her/hers). I'm an Associate Professor in the Department of Mathematical and Statistical Sciences.

I work in the area of low-dimensional topology. You can find my research articles on the publications page and view my CV.

My research is supported by NSF grant DMS-2409398.
